About

Our Mission

Our mission is to make American legislation clear, accessible, and honest. We break down complex bills and policies so that anyone, no matter their background, can understand what‚Äôs happening in our government. We highlight the wins, the failures, and the things flying under the radar.

We believe that informed people make stronger democracies. If elected officials aren‚Äôt voting in line with their constituents‚Äô values, people deserve to know. If a new bill could change your rights, your neighborhood, or your future, we‚Äôll explain it. Clearly, quickly, and without the political noise. Legislate This exists to empower citizens with facts, not spin.

Our Story

Legislate This was founded in 2025 by two 16-year-olds who saw a problem (and an opportunity). One of us was passionate about politics and legislation. The other loved building apps. We teamed up to create something that could make a difference.

We realized that most news makes it feel like nothing works in this country. Everything sounds broken, and it‚Äôs easy to feel like democracy is a mess. But that‚Äôs not the full picture. There are real, important laws being debated and passed, some good and some not, and we wanted to highlight that. Legislate This is our way of showing the real workings of American democracy. What‚Äôs getting done. What‚Äôs not. And why it matters.

What We Do

Simplify Complex Legislation

We break down complex bills into understandable summaries.

Track Legislative Progress

Follow bills through every stage of the legislative process.

Connect Citizens with Representatives

Make it easy to contact and engage with elected officials.
